article: Ten years ago, I moved to Chicago. As I was new to the area, I had  _  friends and rarely went out to parties. But a month later, I was invited to a party and there I  _  an elderly couple. She phoned a few weeks later as  _  and told me that her husband was admitted to the hospital and  _  waiting. I told her that I would go and cheek on him every day when I was at  _  . I thought that if it was my dad, I would do the same, so I was determined to keep  _  with them. Sometimes family comes out of the most unexpected place.
